reference_summary:
Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces.
Qiray
{'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'}
I really enjoyed having something this pretty to put in my hair. You get two of each color, and they are very pretty. I don’t have a lot of hair so they were a bit lose on me. With the pearls on them, they really don’t wrap around too many times and look the same. My daughter put them around her bun in her hair. This accentuated the beauty of the hairpiece, and it worked really well-just an idea for these beautiful hair accessories. They are prettier than the pictures. I’ll be interested to see how long they stay together so I’ll put an update later on how well they last. Very pleased with this product so far, but they are not for people with thin hair.
Really beautifully made
QTMY Fashion Rhinestone Flower Headband,Wide Hair Hoop for Women,Hair Accessories Head Band Headwear,White
QTMY
['QTMY Fashion Rhinestone Flower Headband,Wide Hair Hoop for Women,Hair Accessories Head Band Headwear,White']
{'Color': 'White', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding', 'Material': 'Pearl', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.79 x 5.51 x 1.69 inches; 4.59 Ounces'}
I love this very much. The colors and the beads are amazing ! It did lose one bead when I first got it so that wasn’t nice but I can put it back on sometime. It is very heavy so it slides a lot and is heavy on the head. I get headaches from heavy things so I just have to wear it for special things. I love it very much.
Very  beautiful.

POLISHDUE
{'Brand': 'POLISHDUE', 'Item Form': 'Strip', 'Color': 'Clear,Pink', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Formaldehyde free, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.12 x 3.2 x 1.2 inches; 15.84 Ounces'}
These are very pretty but very thin. The glue on the back of them is super sticky and a mess to clean off your fingers. I don’t recommend these. I use a different brand that can last up to a week, but these peeked of within about two days. Not all the great to cut and file, either. I was not happy with them, I do not recommend. The color was beautiful though.
Very thin.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** The user continues to appreciate aesthetically pleasing hair accessories with unique designs, embellishments, and vibrant colors. Her recent purchase indicates a willingness to explore hair extensions, though she remains discerning about quality and quantity.

- **User Engagement:** The user values durability, performance, comfort, and functionality in hair accessories, particularly clips that fit well. She is proactive in sharing feedback on usability, though her latest experience shows that she has encountered products that didn't fully meet her expectations.

- **Performance Consideration:** She focuses on products that provide a secure yet comfortable fit, remaining attentive to weight and comfort—especially for thin hair. Recent interactions suggest a critical eye on the quality of extensions, emphasizing her desire for effective solutions.

- **Hair Type Consideration:** The user actively seeks items that cater to both her and her daughter’s hair types, prioritizing those that work well with thin hair while being versatile for all hair types.

- **Color Variety:** Her enjoyment of a broad spectrum of colors remains strong, reflecting her preference for beauty products that facilitate self-expression through vibrant designs.

- **Family Orientation:** The user’s interest in beauty products often encompasses her daughter, underlining her preference for multifunctional items that meet both their needs.

Overall, the user balances aesthetics, comfort, and practicality while remaining open to new product types, continually seeking accessories that merge beauty and functionality.
